casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert Wayne STANLEY No. 376P02-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of NC. Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Stanley, Robert Wayne.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of November 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 16th of November 2016 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of December 2016 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
